SELECT af.id AS formId, af.size AS fileSize, af.original_file_name AS originalFileName, DATE_FORMAT(af.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, af.mime_type AS mimeType, af.re_file_name AS reFileName, af.file_path AS filePath, mfc.name AS categoryName FROM application_form af JOIN m_form_category mfc ON mfc.id = af.form_category_id WHERE (
af.form_category_id IN (1,2,3,4,5)
OR ( af.form_category_id = 9 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM risk_of_member rom JOIN m_risk_factor rf ON rf.id = rom.risk_id WHERE rom.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND rf.name = '치매' ) )
OR ( af.form_category_id = 6 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM matching m JOIN care_worker_service_type cwst ON cwst.care_worker_id = m.care_worker_id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND m.status = 'Y' AND cwst.m_service_type_id = 1 ) )
OR ( af.form_category_id = 7 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM matching m JOIN care_worker_service_type cwst ON cwst.care_worker_id = m.care_worker_id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND m.status = 'Y' AND cwst.m_service_type_id = 2 ) )
OR ( af.form_category_id = 8 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM matching m JOIN care_worker_service_type cwst ON cwst.care_worker_id = m.care_worker_id WHERE m.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} AND m.status = 'Y' AND cwst.m_service_type_id = 3 ) ) ) ORDER BY af.form_category_id ASC, af.created_at DESC
